lines: 1.Ni songo i hangwa Savhatha ya Mudzimu,
Ndi yone yo khethwaho kha maduvha othe;
Ro fanele u awela mishumoni yashu-vho,
Yesu a tshi ri sika, o sila Savhatha.
O ri sumbedza ná¸’la ya u ya tadulu;
Ro fanela u tevhedza, Mutshidzi washu Yesu,
U ri neamadi a vhutshilo ha-vhudi.
3. Ri do di U renda, nga duvha lo khethwaho,
Iwe khonani yashu Yesu a funwaho,
Murena Yesu u na lufuno lu mangadzaho,
Na fulufhelo lau li a ri takadza.
